mapper.select: select p.id, p.project_name projectName, d1.dict_code dictCode from sop_project p left join dict d1 on p.project_status=d1.dict_code where p.id=#{projectId};
mapper.insert:
insert into sop_task ( id, project_id, task_name, task_type, task_flag, task_order, task_deadline, department_id, assign_uid, task_status, remark, created_time, updated_time ) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{taskName}, #{taskType}, #{taskFlag}, #{taskOrder}, #{taskDeadline}, #{departmentId}, #{assignUid}, #{taskStatus}, #{remark}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime} );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, date_format(r.meeting_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') meetingDate, d1.name meetingResult FROM sop_meeting_record r left join dict d1 on r.meeting_result=d1.dict_code WHERE r.project_id=#{projectId} and r.meeting_type=#{meetingType} ORDER BY r.created_time desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT id, concat(file_name,'.',file_suffix) as fileName, file_suffix fileSuffix, file_key fileKey, updated_time fileTime FROM sop_file WHERE project_id=#{projectId} and file_worktype=#{fileWorkType} ORDER BY updated_time DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: insert into sop_meeting_scheduling ( id, project_id, meeting_type, meeting_count, meeting_date, status, remark, schedule_status, apply_time, reserve_time_start, reserve_time_end, last_time, updated_time, created_time ) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{meetingType}, #{meetingCount}, #{meetingDate}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{scheduleStatus}, #{applyTime}, #{reserveTimeStart}, #{reserveTimeEnd}, #{lastTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{createdTime} )

insert into sop_file ( project_id, belong_uid, file_valid, project_progress, file_worktype, career_line, file_source, file_type, remark, voucher_id, file_status, file_uid, fil_uri, updated_time, created_time, file_length, file_key, bucket_name, file_name, file_suffix, record_type, meeting_id ) values ( #{projectId}, #{belongUid}, #{fileValid}, #{projectProgress}, #{fileWorkType}, #{careerLine}, #{fileSource}, #{fileType}, #{remark}, #{voucherId}, #{fileStatus}, #{fileUid}, #{filUri}, #{createdTime}, #{createdTime}, #{fileLength}, #{fileKey}, #{bucketName}, #{fileName}, #{fileSuffix}, #{recordType}, #{meetingId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
